name: Dawn Of Annihilation
description:
Dawn Of Annihilation is a top-down demon + zombie shooting game designed by me lilwatchmann! Controls:

F1: Save

Arrow Keys: Move

Left Mouse: Shoot

Right Mouse: Grenade

Warning there is some blood so I would not recommend it for people that get scared of blood. So choose carefully...

Report any bugs to me at lilwatchmann@gmail.com

It works on Linux if you have wine(Note for Linux beginners)
